name: Project Ceres + Asynchronous City
description:
Main Game

You find yourself in the underground after you flee from a catastrophe. Now you want to reach the surface!

Travel from trainstation to trainstation and discover the world underneath.  There are many helpful people that can help you.

Asynchronous City

(Also known as Level 03) This is the last Level of the Game Project Ceres. I developed it in two weeks as a part for an entrance exam. The theme was "asynchronous" and thus I made this Level for this game.

You have to fix the power of this city, because the electricity is not synchronized with the power grid.

Have fun!

Project Ceres is a 3d Platformer I made a couple of years ago (around 2017 - 2018).

The game is in an unfinished state but hopefully you'll still have fun! (I can't acess my HDD anymore, that's why I can't finish the game)
